title: Christmas in the Village
description: A Christmas Eve Baby Dr Lucy Tremayne’s title is about to change from doctor to mother! She knows she must tell Ben he’s going to be a daddy by Christmas – but she’s running out of time... An Italian New-Year Wish As the snow falls Amy Avanti summons up the courage for her new job, knowing it will take her back to another life where she was adoringly in love with her husband... A Bride by Sunrise Adam Donnelly wants his childhood sweetheart for his bride, but he’s got a lot of explaining to do to resolve their past. Then the present intervenes in a dramatic way! A Fatherhood Surprise One of London’s most eligible bachelors, Jack Tremayne lives the VIP life – but his world is turned upside down when he learns that he is a father!
author: Caroline Anderson
